exert verb
(MAKE AN EFFORT)
exert yourself
to make a mental or physical effort: I was too tired to exert myself. Try not to exert yourself while you are recovering - it could set you back. Apart from the odd yoga class, he doesn't really exert himself much. As soon as we stop exerting ourselves, our heart rate should return to normal. She had a nap after lunch every day, even if she had not exerted herself at all.
